AC-1.title: Stack Up
AC-1.description: Given a folder with sample artifacts → When `create-project` runs → Then API `/health` returns 200, web `/` and admin `/admin/` return 200.

evidence.description: Acceptance smoke test covering API, web, and admin reachability.

AC-2.title: OpenAPI Valid
AC-2.description: Given `openapi.yaml` → When `verify` runs → Then swagger‑cli validates spec (exit 0).

AC-3.title: a11y
AC-3.description: Given running web/admin → When pa11y runs on `/` and `/admin/` → Then no errors of severity “error”; warnings allowed.

evidence.description: Accessibility gate using pa11y for web and admin.

AC-4.title: Lighthouse
AC-4.description: Given running web/admin → When Lighthouse runs → Then performance ≥ 0.80, a11y ≥ 0.85.

AC-5.title: Consent
AC-5.description: Given web root → When consent checker runs → Then consent keywords/selectors found and a privacy link exists.

evidence.description: Consent checker ensuring privacy link and selectors.

AC-6.title: Domain Filters
AC-6.description: Given `/programs` endpoint → When filters (type,instructor,level,from,to) are applied → Then results match filters for all items.

evidence.description: Program filter verification across API endpoints.
